00009 #ifndef _h_WEBS
00010 #define _h_WEBS 1
00011 
00012 /******************************** Description *********************************/
00013 
00014 /* 
00015  *      GoAhead Web Server header. This defines the Web public APIs.
00016  *      Include this header for files that contain ASP or Form procedures.
00017  *      Include wsIntrn.h when creating URL handlers.
00018  */
00019 
00020 /********************************* Includes ***********************************/
00021 
00022 #include        "ej.h"
00023 #ifdef WEBS_SSL_SUPPORT
00024         #include        "websSSL.h"
00025 #endif
00026 
00027 /********************************** Defines ***********************************/
00028 /*
00029  *      By license terms the server software name defined in the following line of
00030  *      code must not be modified.
00031  */
00032 #define WEBS_NAME                               T("GoAhead-Webs")
00033 #define WEBS_VERSION                    T("2.1.1")
00034 
00035 #define WEBS_HEADER_BUFINC              512                     /* Header buffer size */
00036 #define WEBS_ASP_BUFINC                 512                     /* Asp expansion increment */
00037 #define WEBS_MAX_PASS                   32                      /* Size of password */
00038 #define WEBS_BUFSIZE                    1000            /* websWrite max output string */
00039 #define WEBS_MAX_HEADER                 (5 * 1024)      /* Sanity check header */
00040 #define WEBS_MAX_URL                    4096            /* Maximum URL size for sanity */
00041 #define WEBS_SOCKET_BUFSIZ              256                     /* Bytes read from socket */
00042 
00043 #define WEBS_HTTP_PORT                  T("httpPort")
00044 #define CGI_BIN                                 T("cgi-bin")
00045 
00046 /* 
00047  *      Request flags. Also returned by websGetRequestFlags().
00048  */
00049 #define WEBS_LOCAL_PAGE                 0x1                     /* Request for local webs page */ 
00050 #define WEBS_KEEP_ALIVE                 0x2                     /* HTTP/1.1 keep alive */
00051 #define WEBS_DONT_USE_CACHE             0x4                     /* Not implemented cache support */
00052 #define WEBS_COOKIE                             0x8                     /* Cookie supplied in request */
00053 #define WEBS_IF_MODIFIED                0x10            /* If-modified-since in request */
00054 #define WEBS_POST_REQUEST               0x20            /* Post request operation */
00055 #define WEBS_LOCAL_REQUEST              0x40            /* Request from this system */
00056 #define WEBS_HOME_PAGE                  0x80            /* Request for the home page */ 
00057 #define WEBS_ASP                                0x100           /* ASP request */ 
00058 #define WEBS_HEAD_REQUEST               0x200           /* Head request */
00059 #define WEBS_CLEN                               0x400           /* Request had a content length */
00060 #define WEBS_FORM                               0x800           /* Request is a form */
00061 #define WEBS_REQUEST_DONE               0x1000          /* Request complete */
00062 #define WEBS_POST_DATA                  0x2000          /* Already appended post data */
00063 #define WEBS_CGI_REQUEST                0x4000          /* cgi-bin request */
00064 #define WEBS_SECURE                             0x8000          /* connection uses SSL */
00065 #define WEBS_AUTH_BASIC                 0x10000         /* Basic authentication request */
00066 #define WEBS_AUTH_DIGEST                0x20000         /* Digest authentication request */
00067 #define WEBS_HEADER_DONE                0x40000         /* Already output the HTTP header */
00068 #define WEBS_MULTIPART_FORM             0x80000         /* Post multipart form for file upload   orik */
00069 
00070 /*
00071  *      URL handler flags
00072  */
00073 #define WEBS_HANDLER_FIRST      0x1                     /* Process this handler first */
00074 #define WEBS_HANDLER_LAST       0x2                     /* Process this handler last */
00075 
00076 /* 
00077  *      Per socket connection webs structure
00078  */
00079 typedef struct websRec {
00080         ringq_t                 header;                         /* Header dynamic string */
00081         time_t                  since;                          /* Parsed if-modified-since time */
00082         sym_fd_t                cgiVars;                        /* CGI standard variables */
00083         sym_fd_t                cgiQuery;                       /* CGI decoded query string */
00084         time_t                  timestamp;                      /* Last transaction with browser */
00085         int                             timeout;                        /* Timeout handle */
00086         char_t                  ipaddr[32];                     /* Connecting ipaddress */
00087         char_t                  type[64];                       /* Mime type */
00088         char_t                  *dir;                           /* Directory containing the page */
00089         char_t                  *path;                          /* Path name without query */
00090         char_t                  *url;                           /* Full request url */
00091         char_t                  *host;                          /* Requested host */
00092         char_t                  *lpath;                         /* Cache local path name */
00093         char_t                  *query;                         /* Request query */
00094         char_t                  *decodedQuery;          /* Decoded request query */
00095         char_t                  *authType;                      /* Authorization type (Basic/DAA) */
00096         char_t                  *password;                      /* Authorization password */
00097         char_t                  *userName;                      /* Authorization username */
00098         char_t                  *cookie;                        /* Cookie string */
00099         char_t                  *userAgent;                     /* User agent (browser) */
00100         char_t*         multiPartBoundary;      /* orik Boundary string for multipart */
00101         char_t                  *protocol;                      /* Protocol (normally HTTP) */
00102         char_t                  *protoVersion;          /* Protocol version */
00103     char_t          *postData;          /* Post data */
00104         int                             sid;                            /* Socket id (handler) */
00105         int                             listenSid;                      /* Listen Socket id */
00106         int                             port;                           /* Request port number */
00107         int                             state;                          /* Current state */
00108         int                             flags;                          /* Current flags -- see above */
00109         int                             code;                           /* Request result code */
00110         int                             clen;                           /* Content length */
00111         int                             wid;                            /* Index into webs */
00112     int             lenPostData;        /* Post data length */
00113         char_t                  *cgiStdin;                      /* filename for CGI stdin */
00114         int                             docfd;                          /* Document file descriptor */
00115         int                             numbytes;                       /* Bytes to transfer to browser */
00116         int                             written;                        /* Bytes actually transferred */
00117         void                    (*writeSocket)(struct websRec *wp);
00118 #ifdef DIGEST_ACCESS_SUPPORT
00119     char_t                      *realm;         /* usually the same as "host" from websRec */
00120     char_t                      *nonce;         /* opaque-to-client string sent by server */
00121     char_t                      *digest;        /* digest form of user password */
00122     char_t                      *uri;           /* URI found in DAA header */
00123     char_t                      *opaque;        /* opaque value passed from server */
00124     char_t                      *nc;            /* nonce count */
00125     char_t                      *cnonce;        /* check nonce */
00126     char_t                      *qop;           /* quality operator */
00127 #endif
00128 #ifdef WEBS_SSL_SUPPORT
00129         websSSL_t               *wsp;           /* SSL data structure */
00130 #endif
00131 } websRec;
00132 
00133 typedef websRec *webs_t;
00134 typedef websRec websType;
00135
